import React, { useState } from 'react' import {FaBars} from 'react-icons/fa' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' function Header() { const [sideBar,setSitebar]=useState(false) const showSidebar=()=>setSitebar(!sideBar) const sideBarStyle=[ {maxWidth:"0", transition:"max-width ease in .5s" }, {maxWidth:"500px", width:"300px", transition:"max-width ease in .5s" } ] return (

Counter App

) } export default Header
